channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas family rejects millions for their property and does something remarkable with it instead: 'I'm just very grateful'
Quicker Boeing deliveries help Ryanair boost profit, traffic forecast
Chinese buyers purchase Brazilian soybeans as prices ease over US-China trade thaw
Edmund Fitzgerald 50th memorials: Where to join remembrances for the 29 lost on the ship
'I Know Nothing': Trump's Pardon Claim Slammed As His Biggest Hypocrisy Yet
WATCH: Obama: 'Country and our politics are in a pretty dark place right now'
item.description: Jersey's race for governor at a rally in Newark on Saturday, saying the "country and our politics are in a pretty dark place right now."

item.title: FDA's top drug regulator quits as agency officials probe actions
item.description: The FDA's top drug regulator, Dr. George Tidmarsh, quit after federal officials began reviewing "serious concerns about his personal conduct," a gover...

item.title: One year out from Election Day, Tuesday's results could shape 2026 midterms
item.description: ABC News is taking a look at the 2026 midterms, now just one year away.

item.title: Hamas returns 3 more Israeli hostages' remains, leaving 8 still in Gaza
item.description: Among the 8 deceased Israeli hostages whose remains are yet to be returned from Gaza is soldier and U.S. citizen Itay Chen.

item.title: WATCH: Two girls thrown from Ferris wheel at Louisiana harvest festival
item.description: Both girls are under 13 years old and were transported to the hospital, with one of them being airlifted to the facilities.

item.title: Latino voters cite affordability, economy as top concerns in new poll
item.description: According to the Unidos Bipartisan Poll of Hispanic Voters: The Road to 2026, 53% of Latino voters cite the cost of living and inflation as their lead...

item.title: Train derails in northwest England with no immediate reports of injuries
item.description: A train has derailed in northwest England, but authorities are reporting no injuries

item.title: 5 climbers, including dad and teen daughter, killed by avalanche
item.description: Two men and a woman were recovered dead on Saturday, while the bodies of a man and his 17-year-old daughter were found on Sunday.

item.title: Trump administration faces a deadline to tell judges whether it will use contingency funds for SNAP
Half of Americans say Trump admin not committed to protecting rights, freedoms: Poll
item.description: Most say Trump isn't committed to protecting freedom of the press, other rights.

item.title: At least 20 people killed as powerful quake hits northern Afghanistan
item.description: Afghanistan's Taliban government says a powerful earthquake in the country's north has killed at least 20 people and left hundreds injured.

item.title: Judge again bars Trump administration from deploying troops to Portland
Hearings to focus on National Guard deployments in the nation’s capital and Memphis, Tennessee
item.description: Hearings are set in two states over the deployment of the National Guard as part of President Donald Trump’s crime-fighting efforts.
